bibl.title: Euripides and the 'Tales from Euripides': Sources of Apollodoros' 'Bibliotheca'.
bibl.note: The Library does not depend directly on the original source but constitutes a late phase of mythographical activity going back to Hellenistic scholarship.
bibl.seg: HUYS Marc, Euripides and the 'Tales from Euripides': Sources of Apollodoros' 'Bibliotheca'.
The Library does not depend directly on the original source but constitutes a late phase of mythographical activity going back to Hellenistic scholarship.
